docs.text: Peter Luro Personal Microsite About Me My name is Peter Luro and I am a passionate software engineer with 3 years of professional experience in the field. I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from WPI and have worked with a variety of programming languages including Python, SQL, C, C++, Java, JavaScript, React, Swagger (YAML), CSS & HTML. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work on a range of exciting projects, from building mobile applications to developing complex enterprise-level software solutions. I pride myself on my ability to work well under pressure, meet tight deadlines, and deliver high-quality code that is both efficient and maintainable. In my free time, I enjoy scripting useful functionality for my day trading side hobby. I have also tested completely automated day trading, using recommendations from various sources attained by Python GET requests. If you're interested in learning more about my work or have a project in mind that you think I could help with, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I'm always excited to collaborate with new people and tackle new challenges! Education Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, GPA: 3.65/4.0
